price: Ntabwo bashobora kuyemera (Qur’an), kandi ingero (z’ibihano bya Allah) ku bo hambere zarabayeho.
arabic: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَقَدۡ خَلَتۡ سُنَّةُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: lā yu'minūna bihi waqad khalat sunnatu al-awalīna
